#Note, you should run this notebook all at once rather than piece by peice
```{r, fig.keep='all'}
library(inflection)
library(sintering)


p <- alumina[alumina$Dope=="Pure",]
plot(p$t, p$y)
grid()
bb <- ese(p$t,p$y,0)
bb
pese=bb[,3];pese
abline(v=pese)
cc=bese(p$t,p$y,0)
cc$iplast
abline(v=cc$iplast,col='blue')

 

foo <- glm(formula = p$y ~ p$t, family=binomial)
plot(foo)

 

plot(p$t, p$y)
spl3 <- smooth.spline(x = p$t, y = p$y, df = 8)
lines(spl3, col = 2)
```
